mapper.select: /* com.sgg.menu.mapper.MenuMapper.getMenu */ SELECT LEVEL LEV , MENU_ID , MENU_NAME , UP_MENU_ID , MENU_NO , MENU_PATH , USER_AUTH , DEL_YN FROM SGG_MENU a1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_AUTH <= #{userAuth} AND MENU_NO > 0 AND DEL_YN = 'N' START WITH UP_MENU_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY UP_MENU_ID = PRIOR MENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY MENU_NO
/* com.sgg.menu.mapper.MenuMapper.getLine */ SELECT LINE_NO , CONTENT_DTL , USER_ID , USE_YN , DEL_YN FROM SGG_PRJ_LINE WHERE 1 = 1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY LINE_NO

/* com.sgg.menu.mapper.MenuMapper.getPre */ SELECT PRE_NO , PRE_HEAD , PRE_DTL , USER_ID , USE_YN , DEL_YN FROM ( SELECT * FROM SGG_PRE WHERE 1 = 1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
